com.organization4242.delmgorb.view

Class DialogWindowView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.organization4242.delmgorb.view.AbstractView
      • com.organization4242.delmgorb.view.DialogWindowView

  • public class DialogWindowView
extends AbstractView
    Represents dialog window with progress bar and cancel button. It is used to display progress of long-going operations such as calculating maximal values or interpolating set of points. It is used to display progress of PlotBuilder task. Also it provides ability to interrupt whose operations. This dialog can not be closed directly, you need to assign custom action listener to cancel button in order to close it.
    Author:
    Murzinov Ilya

    • Constructor Detail

      • DialogWindowView

        public DialogWindowView(String title)
        Initializes dialog window without showing it. If you use this constructor, cancel button will be disabled.
        Parameters:
        title - title of dialog window.
